chunks.zh: 新产品上线，希望大家可以在 Product Hunt 投票支持下，抽 3 位 V 友送 88-188 元现金红包/回复送铜币感谢/回答各类应用出海问题
chunks.en: New product launch! I hope everyone can vote for it on Product Hunt. I'll draw 3 V users to send cash红包 (88-188 yuan) / reply with copper coins as thanks / answer various questions about app going abroad.

chunks.zh: # 基于浏览器的侧边栏 AI 助手正式上线
chunks.en: # Browser-based sidebar AI assistant is officially launched

chunks.zh: 前两个月，抽时间做了款基于浏览器的侧边栏 AI 助手，今天正式上线了。
chunks.en: In the past two months, I took the time to make a browser-based sidebar AI assistant, and today it is officially launched.

chunks.zh: 首先，希望可以大家可以在 Product Hunt 上投个票支持一下：
chunks.en: First of all, I hope everyone can vote for support on Product Hunt:

chunks.zh: 目前大环境不好，选择出海的朋友越来越多，比如我现在在 V 站做推广，那么我想知道点击数据等等，所以就选择了中转一层，这个数据也会在结束后分享追加出来供各位出海的朋友做下参考。
chunks.en: The current environment is not good, and more and more friends are choosing to go abroad. For example, I am now promoting on V station, so I want to know the click data, etc., so I chose to transfer a layer, and this data will be shared and added after the end for your reference.

chunks.zh: 短链接使用的是 @vsean 提供的服务。
chunks.en: The short link uses the service provided by @vsean.

chunks.zh: - 明天（ 28 号）中午 12 点之前的楼层
- 使用 @bfhyqy 在 t/1106143 提供的抽奖工具
chunks.en: - Use the lottery tool provided by @bfhyqy in t/1106143

chunks.zh: - 另外只要回复本帖我就会感谢铜币（直到送完）
chunks.en: - In addition, as long as you reply to this post, I will thank you with copper coins (until they are all given away)

chunks.zh: 大家如果有 stripe/stripe atlas 之类的问题也可以问我，如果想在 stripe atlas 注册公司，那么我可以提供五折注册的优惠码（无任何利益相关）。
chunks.en: If you have any questions about stripe/stripe atlas, you can also ask me. If you want to register a company in stripe atlas, then I can provide a 50% discount registration code (no conflict of interest).

chunks.zh: 替代 edge 侧边栏或许是个不错的主意
chunks.en: Replacing the edge sidebar might be a good idea

chunks.zh: 这种工具个人更倾向永久订阅的套餐
chunks.en: I personally prefer a permanent subscription plan for this type of tool.

chunks.zh: 支持一下，出海的越来越多了！
chunks.en: Support, more and more people are going abroad!

chunks.zh: 看起来不错。给你 upvote 了，但是这类产品已经太多了。现在才出来已经太晚了吧
chunks.en: Looks good.  I upvoted you, but there are just too many products like this already.  Isn't it too late to be coming out with this now?

chunks.zh: 提几个建议，仅供参考。1. 在帖子里面的 append 里面补充产品官网的 url 。2. 产品官网的用户评价建议修改一下。
chunks.en: Here are a few suggestions for your reference. 1. Add the product's official website URL in the append of the post. 2. It is recommended to modify the user reviews on the product's official website.
